Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the symbols and traditions of Hanukkah, Ramadan, and Kwanzaa should be protected.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

term.name: Civil Rights and Liberties, Minority Issues

bill.summary: Recognizes the importance of the symbols and traditions of Hanukkah, Ramadan, and Kwanzaa and expresses support for their use. Expresses disapproval of attempts to ban references to Hanukkah, Ramadan, and Kwanzaa.
